verses.verse: In the <S%H8141>year<s%> that <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5818>Uzziah<s%> <S%H4194>died<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> also the <S%H136>LORD<s%> <S%H3427>sitting<s%> on a <S%H3678>throne,<s%> <S%H7311>high<s%> and <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up, and his <S%H7757>train<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H1964>temple.<s%>

<S%H4605>Above<s%> it <S%H5975>stood<s%> the <S%H8314>seraphim:<s%> <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> had <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3671>wings;<s%> with <S%H8147>two<s%> he <S%H3680>covered<s%> his <S%H6440>face,<s%> and with <S%H8147>two<s%> he <S%H3680>covered<s%> his <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and with <S%H8147>two<s%> he did <S%H5774>fly.<s%>

And one <S%H7121>cried<s%> to <S%H2088>another,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6918>Holy,<s%> <S%H6918>holy,<s%> <S%H6918>holy,<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts:<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H4393>full<s%> of his <S%H3519>glory.<s%>

And the <S%H520>posts<s%> of the <S%H5592>door<s%> <S%H5128>moved<s%> at the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of him that <S%H7121>cried,<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> was <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H6227>smoke.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> I, <S%H188>Woe<s%> is me! for I am <S%H1820>undone;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> I am a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H8193>lips,<s%> and I <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of a <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H8193>lips:<s%> for my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H4428>King,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

Then <S%H5774>flew<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H8314>seraphim<s%> to me, having a <S%H7531>live<s%> <S%H7531>coal<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> which he had <S%H3947>taken<s%> with the <S%H4457>tongs<s%> from <S%H5921>off<s%> the <S%H4196>altar:<s%>

And he <S%H5060>laid<s%> it on my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>See,<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> has <S%H5060>touched<s%> your <S%H8193>lips;<s%> and your <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> is <S%H5493>taken<s%> <S%H5493>away,<s%> and your <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H3722>purged.<s%>

Also I <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H853>Whom<s%> <S%H4310><s%> shall I <S%H7971>send,<s%> and <S%H4310>who<s%> will <S%H3212>go<s%> for us? Then <S%H559>said<s%> I, <S%H2005>Here<s%> am I; <S%H7971>send<s%> me.

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3212>Go,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> you indeed, but <S%H995>understand<s%> not; and <S%H7200>see<s%> you indeed, but <S%H3045>perceive<s%> not.

Make the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8082>fat,<s%> and make their <S%H241>ears<s%> <S%H3513>heavy,<s%> and <S%H8173>shut<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes;<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> they <S%H7200>see<s%> with their <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> with their <S%H241>ears,<s%> and <S%H995>understand<s%> with their <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and <S%H7725>convert,<s%> and be <S%H7495>healed.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> I, <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H5704>how<s%> <S%H5704>long?<s%> And he <S%H559>answered,<s%> <S%H5704>Until<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> be <S%H7582>wasted<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H3427>inhabitant,<s%> and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H120>man,<s%> and the <S%H127>land<s%> be utterly <S%H8077>desolate,<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H7368>removed<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> away, and there be a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H5805>forsaking<s%> in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

But <S%H5750>yet<s%> in it shall be a <S%H6224>tenth,<s%> and it shall <S%H7725>return,<s%> and shall be <S%H1197>eaten:<s%> as a <S%H424>teil<s%> tree, and as an <S%H437>oak,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H4678>substance<s%> is in them, <S%H834>when<s%> they <S%H7995>cast<s%> their leaves: so the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall be the <S%H4678>substance<s%> thereof.
